verses.text: The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* which \w Habakkuk|strong="H2265"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* did \w see|strong="H2372"\w*.

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, how long shall I \w cry|strong="H7768"\w*, and thou wilt not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*! \add even\add* cry \w out|strong="H2199"\w* unto thee \add of\add* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*, and thou wilt not \w save|strong="H3467"\w*!

Why dost thou \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* me \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, and cause \add me\add* to \w behold|strong="H5027"\w* \w grievance|strong="H5999"\w*? for \w spoiling|strong="H7701"\w* and \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \add are\add* before me: and there are \add that\add* raise \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w strife|strong="H7379"\w* and \w contention|strong="H4066"\w*.

Therefore the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* is \w slacked|strong="H6313"\w*, and \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* doth \w never|strong="H5331"\w* go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*: for the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* doth \w compass|strong="H3803"\w* about the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*; therefore \w wrong|strong="H6127"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w proceedeth|strong="H3318"\w*.\f + \fr 1.4 \ft wrong: or, wrested\f*

¶ \w Behold|strong="H7200"\w* ye among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w regard|strong="H5027"\w*, and \w wonder|strong="H8539"\w* \w marvellously|strong="H8539"\w*: for \add I\add* will \w work|strong="H6466"\w* a \w work|strong="H6467"\w* in your \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \add which\add* ye will not \w believe|strong="H0539"\w*, though it be \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \add you\add*.

For, lo, I raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \add that\add* \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* and \w hasty|strong="H4116"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, which shall \w march|strong="H1980"\w* through the \w breadth|strong="H4800"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w dwellingplaces|strong="H4908"\w* \add that are\add* not theirs.\f + \fr 1.6 \ft breadth: Heb. breadths\f*

They \add are\add* \w terrible|strong="H0366"\w* and \w dreadful|strong="H3372"\w*: their \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and their \w dignity|strong="H7613"\w* shall \w proceed|strong="H3318"\w* of themselves.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft their judgment…: or, from them shall proceed the judgment of these, and the captivity of these\f*

Their \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* also are \w swifter|strong="H7043"\w* than the \w leopards|strong="H5246"\w*, and are more \w fierce|strong="H2300"\w* than the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w wolves|strong="H2061"\w*: and their \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* shall \w spread|strong="H6335"\w* themselves, and their \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from \w far|strong="H7350"\w*; they shall \w fly|strong="H5774"\w* as the \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* \add that\add* \w hasteth|strong="H2363"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.\f + \fr 1.8 \ft fierce: Heb. sharp\f*

They shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* all for \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*: their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* shall sup \w up|strong="H4041"\w* \add as\add* the east \w wind|strong="H6921"\w*, and they shall \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w* as the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w*.\f + \fr 1.9 \ft their…: or, the supping up of their faces, etc: or, their faces shall look (Heb. the opposition of their faces) toward the east\f*

And they shall \w scoff|strong="H7046"\w* at the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H7336"\w* shall be a \w scorn|strong="H4890"\w* unto them: they shall \w deride|strong="H7832"\w* every strong \w hold|strong="H4013"\w*; for they shall \w heap|strong="H6651"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3920"\w* it.

Then shall \add his\add* \w mind|strong="H7307"\w* \w change|strong="H2498"\w*, and he shall pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, and \w offend|strong="H0816"\w*, \add imputing\add* \w this|strong="H2098"\w* his \w power|strong="H3581"\w* unto his \w god|strong="H0433"\w*.

¶ \add Art\add* thou not from \w everlasting|strong="H6924"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, mine Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w*? we shall not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, thou hast \w ordained|strong="H7760"\w* them for \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*; and, O mighty \w God|strong="H6697"\w*, thou hast \w established|strong="H3245"\w* them for \w correction|strong="H3198"\w*.  +  r 1.12  t mighty…: Heb. rock *  +  r 1.12  t established: Heb. founded *

\add Thou art\add* of \w purer|strong="H2889"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* than to \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and \w canst|strong="H3201"\w* not \w look|strong="H5027"\w* on \w iniquity|strong="H5999"\w*: wherefore \w lookest|strong="H5027"\w* thou upon them that deal \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w*, \add and\add* holdest thy \w tongue|strong="H2790"\w* when the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w devoureth|strong="H1104"\w* \add the man that is\add* more \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* than he?\f + \fr 1.13 \ft iniquity: or, grievance\f*

And \w makest|strong="H6213"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w* as the \w fishes|strong="H1709"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, as the creeping \w things|strong="H7431"\w*, \add that have\add* no \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* over them?\f + \fr 1.14 \ft creeping: or, moving\f*

They take \w up|strong="H5927"\w* all of them with the \w angle|strong="H2443"\w*, they \w catch|strong="H1641"\w* them in their \w net|strong="H2764"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* them in their \w drag|strong="H4365"\w*: therefore they \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* and are \w glad|strong="H1523"\w*.\f + \fr 1.15 \ft drag: or, flue net\f*

Therefore they \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* unto their \w net|strong="H2764"\w*, and burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto their \w drag|strong="H4365"\w*; because by \w them|strong="H1992"\w* their \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \add is\add* \w fat|strong="H8082"\w*, and their \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* \w plenteous|strong="H1277"\w*.\f + \fr 1.16 \ft plenteous: or, dainty: Heb. fat\f*

Shall they therefore \w empty|strong="H7324"\w* their \w net|strong="H2764"\w*, and not \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* to \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*?
